title: Bobby’s Mind Blown About A Phrase He’s Used for Years + Eddie’s Newly Adopted Son Wants To Change His Name After A Famous Athlete + Raymundo Went A Little Too Hard Over The Weekend and May Be In Trouble….
itunes:title: Bobby’s Mind Blown About A Phrase He’s Used for Years + Eddie’s Newly Adopted Son Wants To Change His Name After A Famous Athlete + Raymundo Went A Little Too Hard Over The Weekend and May Be In Trouble….
description:
Bobby shares a story about how his wife just informed him that he’d be using a phrase wrong his whole life. Eddie shared yesterday that he has officially adopted his two foster sons…and now one of them wants to change their name after a famous athlete. Bobby asks Raymundo a simple question that turns out unlike anything we expected.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
